snippet: The Fighting Irish came back from a 14-point deficit in regulation to defeat Pittsburgh in overtime to remain undefeated (9-0).
abstract: College Football Top 25 Roundup; Notre Dame rallies from 14-point deficit to defeat Pittsburgh, 26-23, in three overtimes, and remain undefeated; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Fighting Irish came back from a 14-point deficit in regulation to defeat Pittsburgh in overtime to remain undefeated (9-0).

headline.seo: Undefeated Notre Dame Survives Scare After Three Overtimes
headline.main: Notre Dame Survives a Scare in Three Overtimes
headline.print_headline: Notre Dame Survives a Scare in Three Overtimes
